mapper.select: select t_user_id from t_user where t_user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_company (t_company_name,t_package_no,t_company_com_reg_num,t_company_clasification, t_company_business,t_company_sectors, t_company_representative,t_company_call_num, t_package_count) VALUES (#{companyName},#{packageNo},#{businessRegistrationNumber},#{businessType},#{businessStatus},#{businessCategory}, #{representativeName},#{companyPhoneNumber}, #{packageCount}) RETURNING t_company_no AS no;
INSERT INTO t_employee (t_user_no,t_company_no,t_employee_auth, t_organization_no,t_employee_state) VALUES (#{userNo},#{companyNo},#{employeeAuth},#{organizationNo},2) RETURNING t_employee_no AS no;
mapper.select: select t_service_no from t_components where t_package_no = #{no}
select t_service_no from t_service where t_service_free = 0;
select t_company_name from t_company where t_company_name = #{companyName}
select t_shortlink_link AS shortLink, t_shortlink_deadline AS shortLinkDeadLine from t_shortlink where t_employee_no = #{empNo}
select t_employee_state from t_employee where t_employee_no = #{empNo}
select t_user_no from t_employee where t_employee_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_employee SET t_employee_state = 2 WHERE t_employee_no = #{empNo};
UPDATE t_user SET t_user_id = #{userId}, t_user_password = #{userPw} WHERE t_user_no = #{userNo};
mapper.select: SELECT t_service.t_service_no AS serviceNo, t_service.t_service_name AS serviceName, t_service.t_service_main_icon_path AS serviceMainIconPath FROM t_service JOIN t_components ON t_service.t_service_no = t_components.t_service_no WHERE t_components.t_package_no = ( SELECT t_package_no FROM t_company WHERE t_company_no =#{comNo});
select t_package_count from t_company where t_company_no = #{comNo};

select count(t_service_published_no) AS publishedCount, t_service_no AS empNo from t_service_published where t_service_no = #{param1} and t_service_recall = -1 and t_employee_no in (select t_employee_no from t_employee where t_company_no = #{param2} ) GROUP BY t_service_no;

SELECT tu.t_user_id AS userId, tu.t_user_name AS userName, te.t_employee_duty AS empDuty, te.t_employee_position AS empPosition, te.t_employee_no AS empNo FROM t_user tu INNER JOIN t_employee te ON tu.t_user_no = te.t_user_no WHERE te.t_company_no = #{param1} AND te.t_employee_state = 2 AND te.t_employee_no NOT IN ( SELECT tp.t_employee_no FROM t_service_published tp INNER JOIN t_employee te ON tp.t_employee_no = te.t_employee_no WHERE tp.t_service_no = #{param2} AND te.t_company_no = #{param1} AND te.t_employee_state = 2 AND tp.t_service_recall = -1 );

SELECT tu.t_user_id AS userId, tu.t_user_name AS userName, te.t_employee_duty AS empDuty, te.t_employee_position AS empPosition, te.t_employee_no AS empNo FROM t_user tu INNER JOIN t_employee te ON tu.t_user_no = te.t_user_no WHERE te.t_company_no = #{param1} AND te.t_employee_state = 2 AND te.t_employee_no IN ( SELECT tp.t_employee_no FROM t_service_published tp INNER JOIN t_employee te ON tp.t_employee_no = te.t_employee_no WHERE tp.t_service_no = #{param2} AND te.t_company_no = #{param1} AND te.t_employee_state = 2 AND tp.t_service_recall = -1 );
mapper.update: UPDATE t_service_published SET t_service_recall = 0, t_service_recall_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE t_employee_no = #{param1} AND t_service_no = #{param2};
